name: Lemon Orzo Chicken

Chicken: 1 lb – Chicken Breast, bite size pieces
Orzo: 2 medium – Zucchini or yellow squash, grated

instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, pat dry, and season with the chicken spices
Heat olive oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add chicken adn cook until chicken is almost done, set chicken aside on plate
Melt butter, then add onions and saute for ~4 minutes
Add orzo and saute for ~2 minutes
Add zucchini and garlic to cook for ~2 minutes
Whisk in chicken broth and cornstarch then add both to the pot
Add lemon zest/juice, chicken bouillon, thyme, salt and pepper to the pot
Add chicken back into the pot
Cover the pot and bring to a simmer until orzo is tender, approx 8-10 minutes
Stir every few minutes to prevent burning
Add additional broth if orzo needs more liquid, finished orzo has a risotto consistency
Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste
